The 51-year-old Mike Pence is a darling of social conservatives and often describes himself as a Christian, a conservative, and a Republican, in that order. The congressman's future has been the subject of speculation since he resigned the No. 3 GOP House leadership slot after winning sixth term in November. " Bill Stephan , a friend of Mike Pence 's since they attended the Indiana University School of Law-Indianapolis together, said Mike Pence was always clear on what he stood for and what he was passionate about. I just remember Mike Pence as someone who, even then, wore his heart on his sleeve, Bill Stephan said.
